analysis.name: SOLIDITY_VISIBILITY
analysis.content: functionnewPolicy(string_carrierFlightNumber,string_departureYearMonthDay,uint_departureTime,uint_arrivalTime)notInMaintenance{_departureYearMonthDay=toYMD(_departureTime);if(msg.value<minPremium||msg.value>maxPremium){LOG_PolicyDeclined(0,'Invalid premium value');if(!msg.sender.send(msg.value)){LOG_SendFail(0,'newPolicy sendback failed (1)');}return;}if(_arrivalTime<_departureTime||_arrivalTime>_departureTime+2days||_departureTime<now+24hours||_departureTime>contractDeadline){LOG_PolicyDeclined(0,'Invalid arrival/departure time');if(!msg.sender.send(msg.value)){LOG_SendFail(0,'newPolicy sendback failed (2)');}return;}bytes32riskId=sha3(_carrierFlightNumber,_departureYearMonthDay,_arrivalTime);riskr=risks[riskId];if(msg.value*r.premiumMultiplier+r.cumulatedWeightedPremium>=maxCumulatedWeightedPremium){LOG_PolicyDeclined(0,'Cluster risk');if(!msg.sender.send(msg.value)){LOG_SendFail(0,'newPolicy sendback failed (3)');}return;}elseif(r.cumulatedWeightedPremium==0){r.cumulatedWeightedPremium=maxCumulatedWeightedPremium;}uintpolicyId=policies.length++;customerPolicies[msg.sender].push(policyId);policyp=policies[policyId];p.customer=msg.sender;p.premium=bookAndCalcRemainingPremium();p.riskId=riskId;if(r.premiumMultiplier==0){r.carrierFlightNumber=_carrierFlightNumber;r.departureYearMonthDay=_departureYearMonthDay;r.arrivalTime=_arrivalTime;}else{r.cumulatedWeightedPremium+=p.premium*r.premiumMultiplier;}p.state=policyState.Applied;p.stateMessage='Policy applied by customer';p.stateTime=now;LOG_PolicyApplied(policyId,msg.sender,_carrierFlightNumber,p.premium);getFlightStats(policyId,_carrierFlightNumber);}
